author: Maxwell Zeff
title: Google Asks Regulators to Liberate Apple's Blue Text Bubbles
description: Google sent a letter to European regulators asking them to free up Apple’s iMessage for all platforms, according to a report from the Financial Times Wednesday. The EU Commission said Apple is gatekeeping iMessage in September, and Google’s letter unnecessari…
